title: Pre-Colonial Indigenous Democratic Governance Models
summary: Indigenous societies across the Americas developed complex democratic systems predating European colonization, featuring sophisticated conflict resolution mechanisms, representation models, and collective decision-making processes that challenge modern Western democratic assumptions.
